responsibilities: Assist in building and maintaining data validation framework
Design, build, and maintain test automation scripts to validate features, requirements, and data pipeline
Work closely with cross-team to review requirements, identify testing needs, and build test cases
Assist in building CI/CD pipeline to execute test automation
Promote a culture of data quality by driving awareness across cross-functional teams
Execute both manual and automated tests to validate functionality and data accuracy
skills: Experience with a modern data stack (Object stores like S3, Spark, Airflow, Lakehouse architectures, real-time databases, Glue, Athena, Sagemaker, Jupyter Notebook)
Experience with automated test tools (Great Expectations, Lambda test, Selenium, Cucumber, PyTest, Cypress)
Understanding of automation strategies & techniques for testing data, application, and CI/CD infrastructure
Strong desire and motivation to take up challenges and opportunities
Demonstrates mutual respect, embraces diversity, equity, and inclusion, and acts with authenticity
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on building and maintaining data validation frameworks, designing test automation scripts, and working with CI/CD pipelines. The skills required include proficiency in Python, experience with modern data stacks, and knowledge of automated test tools. There is no mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is primarily on data validation, testing, and automation within a data engineering context. The tools and technologies mentioned, such as S3, Spark, Airflow, and various test automation tools, are not specifically related to GenAI or LLMs.
